mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_stdt_grow_hist.select */ SELECT stdt_no /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ ,grow_hist_seq /* grow_hist_seq 성장_기록_순번 numeric */ ,mesu_dt /* mesu_dt 측정_일자 character(8) */ ,hght_unit_cd /* hght_unit_cd 키_단위_코드 character varying(20) */ ,hght_val /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */ ,wght_unit_cd /* wght_unit_cd 체중_단위_코드 character varying(20) */ ,wght_val /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */ ,wast_unit_cd /* wast_unit_cd 허리_단위_코드 character varying(20) */ ,wast_val /* wast_val 허리_값 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ts_stdt_grow_hist WHERE 1 = 1 AND stdt_no = #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ AND grow_hist_seq = #{growHistSeq} /* grow_hist_seq 성장_기록_순번 numeric */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_stdt_grow_hist.insert */ INSERT INTO ts_stdt_grow_hist ( stdt_no /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ ,grow_hist_seq /* grow_hist_seq 성장_기록_순번 numeric */
,mesu_dt /* mesu_dt 측정_일자 character(8) */
,hght_unit_cd /* hght_unit_cd 키_단위_코드 character varying(20) */
,hght_val /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */
,wght_unit_cd /* wght_unit_cd 체중_단위_코드 character varying(20) */
,wght_val /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */
,wast_unit_cd /* wast_unit_cd 허리_단위_코드 character varying(20) */
,wast_val /* wast_val 허리_값 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) VALUES ( #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ #{growHistSeq} /* grow_hist_seq 성장_기록_순번 numeric */
,#{mesuDt} /* mesu_dt 측정_일자 character(8) */
,#{hghtUnitCd} /* hght_unit_cd 키_단위_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{hghtVal} /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */
,#{wghtUnitCd} /* wght_unit_cd 체중_단위_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{wghtVal} /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */
,#{wastUnitCd} /* wast_unit_cd 허리_단위_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{wastVal} /* wast_val 허리_값 numeric */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ )
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_stdt_grow_hist.update */ UPDATE ts_stdt_grow_hist
,mesu_dt = #{mesuDt} /* mesu_dt 측정_일자 character(8) */
,hght_unit_cd = #{hghtUnitCd} /* hght_unit_cd 키_단위_코드 character varying(20) */
,hght_val = #{hghtVal} /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */
,wght_unit_cd = #{wghtUnitCd} /* wght_unit_cd 체중_단위_코드 character varying(20) */
,wght_val = #{wghtVal} /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */
,wast_unit_cd = #{wastUnitCd} /* wast_unit_cd 허리_단위_코드 character varying(20) */
,wast_val = #{wastVal} /* wast_val 허리_값 numeric */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND stdt_no = #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ AND grow_hist_seq = #{growHistSeq} /* grow_hist_seq 성장_기록_순번 numeric */
